# KH Contracting - Snow Removal & Property Maintenance

## Company Overview
KH Contracting is a reliable, locally owned property maintenance company in Thunder Bay, Ontario. We specialize in residential and commercial snow removal during the winter and general contracting services (fence posts, moving, junk removal) year-round.

## Core Services

### Snow Removal
- **Residential**: Driveway clearing, walkway shoveling, and salting. Automated dispatch at 5cm accumulation.
- **Commercial**: Parking lot maintenance, salt/sand application, and snow hauling. 24/7 monitoring.

### Year-Round Services
- **Fence Posts**: Professional post hole digging and setting (4x4, 6x6).
- **Moving Help**: Loading/unloading assistance and general labor.
- **Dump Runs**: Removal of household junk, construction debris, and yard waste.

## Service Area
We serve the entire Thunder Bay area, including:
- Port Arthur
- Fort William
- Current River
- Westfort
- Northwood
- Grandview

## Contact Information
- **Phone**: (807) 632-3675
- **Email**: dupont_92@hotmail.com
- **Location**: Thunder Bay, ON

## Pricing Model
- **Seasonal Contracts**: Flat rate for unlimited clearings (Nov 1 - Apr 1).
- **Per Visit**: Pay-as-you-go options available.
- **Quotes**: Free estimates provided for all services.

## Why Choose Us?
- Licensed & Insured
- Reliable Equipment (Plastic blades to protect driveways)
- GPS Tracking on fleet
- "No Excuses" service guarantee
